title: Mother-daughter dead, father-son injured in same accident
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A mother and daughter of the same family have been killed in a three wheeler accident in Kawarakkulama area in Anuradhapura.
Police stated that the three-wheeler had overturned while traveling towards Anuradhapura this morning (2).
The deceased were identified as a 42 years old woman and the daughter, who was 14 years old.
The father and son, who were injured in the same accident have been admitted to the Anuradhapura Hospital.
